StreamingEndpointCreationOptions StreamingEndpointCreationOptions Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll

The options to create a streaming endpoint, which contains all parameters and settings to configure a streaming endpoint

name
String String

Name of the streaming endpoint to be created

Edit

Default CDN Profile.

Edit

Default streaming endpoint version.

SupportedEndpointVersions SupportedEndpointVersions

List of supported endpoint versions.

Properties

AccessControl AccessControl

Edit

Gets or sets access control policies to the streaming endpoint such as IP Allow List, Akamai G2O authentication keys, etc.

public StreamingEndpointAccessControl AccessControl { get; set; }Public Property AccessControl As StreamingEndpointAccessControl
Value
StreamingEndpointAccessControl StreamingEndpointAccessControl

CacheControl CacheControl

Edit

Gets or sets custom asset cache lifetime for assets served through the streaming endpoint.

public StreamingEndpointCacheControl CacheControl { get; set; }Public Property CacheControl As StreamingEndpointCacheControl
Value
StreamingEndpointCacheControl StreamingEndpointCacheControl

CdnEnabled CdnEnabled

Edit

Gets or sets if CDN to be enabled on this Streaming Endpoint.

public bool CdnEnabled { get; set; }Public Property CdnEnabled As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

CdnProfile CdnProfile

Edit

Gets or sets Cdn Profile

public string CdnProfile { get; set; }Public Property CdnProfile As String
Value
String String

CdnProvider CdnProvider

Edit

Gets or sets Cdn provider

public CdnProviderType CdnProvider { get; set; }Public Property CdnProvider As CdnProviderType
Value
CdnProviderType CdnProviderType

CrossSiteAccessPolicies CrossSiteAccessPolicies

Edit

Gets or sets cross site access policies policies to the streaming endpoint such as client access policy and cross domain access policy.

public CrossSiteAccessPolicies CrossSiteAccessPolicies { get; set; }Public Property CrossSiteAccessPolicies As CrossSiteAccessPolicies
Value
CrossSiteAccessPolicies CrossSiteAccessPolicies

CustomHostNames CustomHostNames

Edit

Gets or sets one or more "vanity" host names to be accepted by the streaming endpoint in addition to default endpoint name.

public IEnumerable<string> CustomHostNames { get; set; }Public Property CustomHostNames As IEnumerable(Of String)
Value
IEnumerable<String> IEnumerable(Of String)

Description Description

Edit

Gets or sets description or friendly name of the streaming endpoint.

public string Description { get; set; }Public Property Description As String
Value
String String

Name Name

Edit

Gets or sets the name of the streaming endpoint.

public string Name { get; set; }Public Property Name As String
Value
String String

ScaleUnits ScaleUnits

Edit

Gets or sets the streaming endpoint scale units.

public int ScaleUnits { get; set; }Public Property ScaleUnits As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

StreamingEndpointVersion StreamingEndpointVersion

Edit

Gets or sets streaming endpoint version. Existing endpoints are 1 and new endpoints are 2.

public Version StreamingEndpointVersion { get; set; }Public Property StreamingEndpointVersion As Version
Value
Version Version
